data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
1. Add Customer: This button allows the administrator to add a new customer to the salon's database.
2. Edit Customer: This button allows the administrator to edit the details of an existing customer in the salon's database.
3. Delete Customer: This button allows the administrator to delete a customer from the salon's database.
4. View Customer: This button allows the administrator to view the details of a specific customer in the salon's database.
5. Add Appointment: This button allows the administrator to schedule a new appointment for a customer.
6. Edit Appointment: This button allows the administrator to edit the details of an existing appointment.
7. Cancel Appointment: This button allows the administrator to cancel an appointment for a customer.
8. View Appointment: This button allows the administrator to view the details of a specific appointment.
9. Add Stylist: This button allows the administrator to add a new stylist to the salon's database.
10. Edit Stylist: This button allows the administrator to edit the details of an existing stylist in the salon's database.
11. Delete Stylist: This button allows the administrator to delete a stylist from the salon's database.
12. View Stylist: This button allows the administrator to view the details of a specific stylist in the salon's database.
13. Generate Report: This button allows the administrator to generate reports related to customer appointments, stylist performance, and salon revenue.
14. Settings: This button allows the administrator to access and modify settings related to the app, such as notification preferences, database backup, and user access control.
15. Help: This button allows the administrator to access help documentation, tutorials, and FAQs to assist them in using the app effectively.
